title: Why did BTS stop doing Japanese MV's? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bts just recently released a Japanese album:Map of the soul: journey it has many amazing new song and japanese versions to their previous songs along with a music video called: Stay Gold. I guess you might not have know but you can check it out on youtube.
Actually they made a mv for their recent japanese album (map of the soul the journey) track called stay gold You can watch it here
